dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4133726J] Immediate Legal Action
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2007 8:37 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4133726J] Immediate Legal Action ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Immediate Legal Action Added by system at Thursday, May 17 2007 01:35 am X-MailFrom: abstaff@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu May 17 01:35:55 2007 Received: (qmail 31952 invoked by alias); 17 May 2007 06:35:55 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 31949 invoked from network); 17 May 2007 06:35:55 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; Thu, 17 May 2007 01:35:50 -0500 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1179383745-25183-59-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from wr-out-0506.google.com (wr-out-0506.google.com [64.233.184.230]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 52AC369470 for ; Thu, 17 May 2007 01:35:50 -0500 (CDT) Received: by wr-out-0506.google.com with SMTP id 57so432804wri for ; Wed, 16 May 2007 23:35:35 -0700 (PDT) DKIM-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:mime-version:content-type; b=fLGPHTabmJDr750uckbfh6FIABiyOadYMTZ2kheF6ZJ8DCpwqj5yuuK9TO+LTg7q5omgxc I7sMIH0sACYo/2a2v+jAbsCQbfXCXQ6Pq9/GeYNs4UifKhJ33FTbvpIOQuLxuDJbzOvU0pRv Yx1cNE5r4eSkVAsn9d8p1m6WLKbJc= Received: by 10.114.205.1 with SMTP id c1mr14840wag.1179383734547; Wed, 16 May 2007 23:35:34 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.115.111.14 with HTTP; Wed, 16 May 2007 23:35:34 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <1d0766900705162335t367ca0b9ub7aa18eb3d201c90@mail.gmail.com> Date: Thu, 17 May 2007 02:35:34 -0400 From: AlbumBase To: abuse@ev1servers.net, abuse@theplanet.com X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Immediate Legal Action Subject: Immediate Legal Action MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_39136_24603127.1179383734477" X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: abstaff@gmail.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 17 May 2007 06:35:50.0355 (UTC) FILETIME=[9C2E9230:01C7984D] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear EV1 Servers and The Planet, Your customer hosting AlbumHunt.com completely ripped off my site AlbumBase.com. But where it crosses the line is when they use my company information of Tatto, Inc. in their Users Agreement and Privacy Policy. This is unacceptable as I am receiving legal threats for something I do not own or control. I have emailed AlbumHunt and have not received any response. Please shut down their site and respond with their customer information ASAP. Sincerely, Lucas Brown President, Tatto, Inc. MIME element (text/html) Dear EV1 Servers and The Planet,

Your customer hosting AlbumHunt.com completely ripped off my site AlbumBase.com. But where it crosses the line is when they use my company information of Tatto, Inc. in their Users Agreement and Privacy Policy. This is unacceptable as I am receiving legal threats for something I do not own or control. I have emailed AlbumHunt and have not received any response. Please shut down their site and respond with their customer information ASAP.

Sincerely,
Lucas Brown
President, Tatto, Inc.
MIME element (text/plain)
